bioAsHtml: Haoyuan Li is founder and CEO of Tachyon Nexus. He is also a computer science Ph.D. candidate in AMPLab at UC Berkeley, where he co-created Tachyon, an open source memory-centric distributed storage system. He is a founding committer of Apache Spark. Before Berkeley, he worked at Conviva and Google. Haoyuan has an M.S. from Cornell University and a B.S. from Peking University.

acceptedTalks.title: Real World Use Cases for Tachyon, a memory-centric distributed storage system

bio: Haoyuan Li is founder and CEO of Tachyon Nexus. He is also a computer science Ph.D. candidate in AMPLab at UC Berkeley, where he co-created Tachyon, an open source memory-centric distributed storage system. He is a founding committer of Apache Spark. Before Berkeley, he worked at Conviva and Google. Haoyuan has an M.S. from Cornell University and a B.S. from Peking University.
